name.description: Name of the request parameter to identify the files at backend.
name.description_zh: 用于标识后端文件的请求参数的名称。

url.description: Remote url to upload the files.
url.description_zh: 远程 url 上传文件。

mode.description: Defines the UI of the component, possible values are 'advanced' and 'basic'.
mode.description_zh: 定义组件的 UI，可能的值为 'advanced' 和 'basic'。

multiple.description: Used to select multiple files at once from file dialog.
multiple.description_zh: 用于从文件对话框中一次选择多个文件。

accept.description: Pattern to restrict the allowed file types such as 'image/*'.
accept.description_zh: Pattern 来限制允许的文件类型，例如 'image/*'。

auto.description: When enabled, upload begins automatically after selection is completed.
auto.description_zh: 启用后，选择完成后会自动开始上传。

maxFileSize.description: Maximum file size allowed in bytes.
maxFileSize.description_zh: 允许的最大文件大小（以字节为单位）。

invalidFileSizeMessage.default: : Invalid file size, file size should be smaller than {1.}
invalidFileSizeMessage.description: Message of the invalid fize size.
invalidFileSizeMessage.description_zh: 无效 fize 大小的消息。

invalidFileLimitMessage.default: Maximum number of files to be uploaded is {0.}
invalidFileLimitMessage.description: Message to display when number of files to be uploaded exceeeds the limit.
invalidFileLimitMessage.description_zh: 当要上传的文件数超过限制时显示的消息。

invalidFileTypeMessage.description: Message of the invalid fize type.
invalidFileTypeMessage.description_zh: 无效 fize 类型的消息。

fileLimit.description: Maximum number of files that can be uploaded.

withCredentials.description: Cross-site Access-Control requests should be made using credentials such as cookies, authorization headers or TLS client certificates.
withCredentials.description_zh: 跨站点访问控制请求应使用 Cookie、授权标头或 TLS 客户端证书等凭据发出。

previewWidth.description: Width of the image thumbnail in pixels.
previewWidth.description_zh: 图像缩略图的宽度（以像素为单位）。

chooseLabel.description: Label of the choose button. Defaults to PrimeVue Locale configuration.
chooseLabel.description_zh: choose 按钮的标签。默认为 PrimeVue Locale 配置。

uploadLabel.description: Label of the upload button. Defaults to PrimeVue Locale configuration.
uploadLabel.description_zh: 上传按钮的标签。默认为 PrimeVue Locale 配置。

cancelLabel.description: Label of the cancel button. Defaults to PrimeVue Locale configuration.
cancelLabel.description_zh: 取消按钮的标签。默认为 PrimeVue Locale 配置。

customUpload.description: Whether to use the default upload or a manual implementation defined in uploadHandler callback. Defaults to PrimeVue Locale configuration.
customUpload.description_zh: 是使用默认上传还是 uploadHandler 回调中定义的手动实现。默认为 PrimeVue Locale 配置。

showUploadButton.description: Whether to show the upload button.

showCancelButton.description: Whether to show the cancel button.
showCancelButton.description_zh: 是否显示 cancel （取消） 按钮。

:chooseButtonProps.description: Used to pass all properties of the ButtonProps to the choose button inside the component.
:chooseButtonProps.description_zh: 用于将 ButtonProps 的所有属性传递给组件内的 choose 按钮。

:uploadButtonProps.description: Used to pass all properties of the ButtonProps to the upload button inside the component.
:uploadButtonProps.description_zh: 用于将 ButtonProps 的所有属性传递给组件内的上传按钮。

:cancelButtonProps.description: Used to pass all properties of the ButtonProps to the cancel button inside the component.
:cancelButtonProps.description_zh: 用于将 ButtonProps 的所有属性传递给组件内的 cancel 按钮。

dt.description: It generates scoped CSS variables using design tokens for the component.
dt.description_zh: 它使用组件的设计令牌生成范围限定的 CSS 变量。

pt.description: Used to pass attributes to DOM elements inside the component.
pt.description_zh: 用于将属性传递给组件内的 DOM 元素。

ptOptions.description: Used to configure passthrough(pt) options of the component.
ptOptions.description_zh: 用于配置组件的 passthrough（pt） 选项。

unstyled.description: When enabled, it removes component related styles in the core.
unstyled.description_zh: 启用后，它会删除核心中与组件相关的样式。

slots.name: header
slots.params: { files: File, // Files to upload. uploadedFiles: File, // Uploaded files. chooseCallback: () ⇒ void, // Choose function uploadCallback: () ⇒ void, // Upload function clearCallback: () ⇒ void, // Clear function }

slots.name: content
slots.params: { files: File, // Files to upload. uploadedFiles: File, // Uploaded files. removeUploadedFileCallback: (index: number) ⇒ void, // Function to remove an uploaded file. removeFileCallback: (index: number) ⇒ void, // Function to remove a file. progress: number, // Uploaded progress as number. messages: undefined, // Status messages about upload process. }
slots.description_zh: 自定义上传的内容模板。

slots.name: empty
slots.description: Custom content when there is no selected file.
slots.description_zh: 没有选定文件时的自定义内容。

slots.name: chooseicon
slots.description_zh: 自定义 Choose 图标模板。

slots.name: fileremoveicon
slots.description: Custom remove icon template for each file.
slots.description_zh: 每个文件的自定义删除图标模板。

slots.name: filelabel
